## Species codes: 

Full list of tree species codes is available [here](https://www.for.gov.bc.ca/hre/becweb/resources/codes-standards/standards-species.html). 

Table 1. Codes of common tree species mentioned in the CCISS documentation 

|                        |                           |          |
|------------------------|---------------------------|----------|
| **Common Name**        | **Latin Name**            | **Code** | 
| Douglas-fir            | *Pseudotsuga menziesii*   | Fd       |
| Western redcedar       | *Thuja plicata*           | Cw       |
